document_data.mainbody:
olvayas Barrison DelArmgo was a drow priestess of Lolth in Menzoberranzan and a member of House Barrison DelArmgo in the late 14 century DR.
Molvayas was an instructor at Arach-Tinilith.
During the Silence of Lolth in the , her niece Drisinil Barrison DelArmgo started a coup against Matron Mistress Quenthel Baenre, who in her eyes had lost Lolths favor. Drisinil profited off the opportunity to kill Molvayas, saying to fellow conspirators that she had surely betrayed them to Quenthel.
